resources.string: Please select an algorithm to use, or to find out more about the authors of this application:

Mobile Pairwise Gene Sequence Alignment application developed by Paul Stasiuk and Zach Romer for Dr.Mark Albert COMP271 at Loyola University Chicago for more information about the algorithms used in the application, please visit: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Needleman-Wunsch and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smith-Watermans
